me.lucko.helper

Interface Events.DefaultFilters

  • Enclosing class:
    Events

    @NonnullByDefault
public static interface Events.DefaultFilters
    Provides a set of useful default filters for passing to Events.HandlerBuilder.filter(Predicate).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends EntityEvent>
      Predicate<T>      		 entityHasMetadata(MetadataKey<?> key)
      Returns a predicate which only returns true if the entity has a given metadata key
      <T extends Cancellable>
      Predicate<T>      		 ignoreCancelled()
      Returns a predicate which only returns true if the event isn't cancelled
      <T extends PlayerMoveEvent>
      Predicate<T>      		 ignoreSameBlock()
      Returns a predicate which only returns true if the player has moved over a block
      <T extends PlayerMoveEvent>
      Predicate<T>      		 ignoreSameBlockAndY()
      Returns a predicate which only returns true if the player has moved over a block, not including movement directly up and down.
      <T extends PlayerMoveEvent>
      Predicate<T>      		 ignoreSameChunk()
      Returns a predicate which only returns true if the player has moved over a chunk border
      <T extends PlayerEvent>
      Predicate<T>      		 playerHasMetadata(MetadataKey<?> key)
      Returns a predicate which only returns true if the player has a given metadata key
      <T extends PlayerEvent>
      Predicate<T>      		 playerHasPermission(String permission)
      Returns a predicate which only returns true if the player has the given permission

      • ignoreSameBlockAndY

        <T extends PlayerMoveEvent> Predicate<T> ignoreSameBlockAndY()
        Returns a predicate which only returns true if the player has moved over a block, not including movement directly up and down. (so jumping wouldn't return true)
        Type Parameters:
        T - the event type
        Returns:
        a predicate which only returns true if the player has moved across a block border
